abstract: After a $3.7 billion trading loss and amid growing public pressure on boards to have succession plans in place, the issue has become more urgent at Morgan Stanley.
snippet: After a $3.7 billion trading loss and amid growing public pressure on boards to have succession plans in place, the issue has become more urgent at Morgan Stanley.
lead_paragraph: Like all chief executives on Wall Street, John J. Mack has grappled with the question of who will succeed him.

headline.main: At Morgan Stanley, a New Focus on Succession
headline.print_headline: At Morgan Stanley, a New Focus on Succession

abstract: Amgen and Johnson & Johnson strengthened the label warnings for their anemia drugs, placing further emphasis on the risk of heart attacks, a worsening of cancer and death.
snippet: Amgen and Johnson & Johnson strengthened the label warnings for their anemia drugs, placing further emphasis on the risk of heart attacks, a worsening of cancer and death.
lead_paragraph: Amgen and Johnson & Johnson strengthened the label warnings for their widely used anemia drugs yesterday, placing further emphasis on the risk that the medicines could cause heart attacks, a worsening of cancer and death.

headline.main: Stronger Warnings on 3 Drugs for Anemia
headline.print_headline: Stronger Warnings On 3 Drugs For Anemia
